    • Uses of PluginParametersBuilder in sortpom.parameter

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PluginParametersBuilder PluginParametersBuilder.setBackupInfo(boolean createBackupFile, String backupFileExtension)
      Sets information regarding backup file
      PluginParametersBuilder PluginParametersBuilder.setEncoding(String encoding)
      Sets which encoding should be used throughout the plugin
      PluginParametersBuilder PluginParametersBuilder.setFormatting(String lineSeparator, boolean expandEmptyElements, boolean keepBlankLines)
      Sets formatting information that is used when the pom file is sorted
      PluginParametersBuilder PluginParametersBuilder.setIndent(int nrOfIndentSpace, boolean indentBlankLines)
      Sets indent information that is used when the pom file is sorted
      PluginParametersBuilder PluginParametersBuilder.setPomFile(File pomFile)
      Sets pomFile location
      PluginParametersBuilder PluginParametersBuilder.setSortEntities(String sortDependencies, String sortPlugins, boolean sortProperties)
      Sets if any additional pom file elements should be sorted
      PluginParametersBuilder PluginParametersBuilder.setSortOrder(String customSortOrderFile, String predefinedSortOrder)
      Sets which sort order that should be used when sorting
      PluginParametersBuilder PluginParametersBuilder.setVerifyFail(String verifyFail)
      Sets the verify operation behaviour
